thread.title: Dr. James Andrews performs Tommy John surgery on Baltimore Orioles' Branden Kline: 4 points
thread.title_full: Dr. James Andrews performs Tommy John surgery on Baltimore Orioles' Branden Kline: 4 points

author: avaidya@beckershealthcare.com (Anuja Vaidya)
title: Dr. James Andrews performs Tommy John surgery on Baltimore Orioles' Branden Kline: 4 points
text:
Dr. James Andrews performs Tommy John surgery on Baltimore Orioles' Branden Kline: 4 points Written by Anuja Vaidya | Monday, 12   
James Andrews, MD, performed elbow surgery on Baltimore Orioles pitching prospect Branden Kline, according to a report by The Frederick News-Post. 
Here are four points: 

1. Dr. Andrews performed Tommy John surgery on Mr. Kline after he complained about tightness in his right elbow. 

2. Dr. Andrews is the founding member of Andrews Sports Medicine and Orthopaedic Institute in Gulf Breeze, Fla. 
3. He serves as the president and chairman of the Board of the Andrews Research and Education Foundation. 

4. Dr. Andrews is a senior consultant for the Washington Redskins and the orthopedic medical director for the Tampa Bay Rays.
